mapper.select: SELECT CFSV_ANAL_INDIR FROM WISE_CF_SERVER WHERE 1=1 AND CFSV_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT CFSV_STD_INDIR FROM WISE_CF_SERVER WHERE 1=1 AND CFSV_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT B.CFCT_VALUE AS label , A.CFST_CONTENT AS content , '' AS docid FROM WISE_CF_STUDY_DATA A LEFT OUTER JOIN WISE_CF_CATEGORY B ON A.CFCT_ID = B.CFCT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.CFSV_ID = #{_parameter}
